channel.title: Your self in a NpcDialogue. (317)
channel.description:
(317 server type) How do i make my self saying something in a NpcDialogue?
Like :
Santa : hey you need to own a Monster You : How do i do it? Santa : Use your weapon
Hope someone can help me :D Youridudock
